hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.CREATOR, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.CREATE_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.MODIFIER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.MODIFY_TIME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.REC_VER, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.REC_STATUS, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.ORG_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_ID, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_EOGP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_EOCP_PM_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_PREFERRED_WH_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_PREFERRED_WH_NAME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_STOCK_CHECK_RULE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_COMPARTMENTS_RULE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_PREFERRED_SPLIT_RULE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_IS_CREATE_REQUISITION_IN, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_REQUISITION_IN_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_REQUISITION_IN_NAME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_IS_CREATE_REQUISITION_OUT, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_REQUISITION_OUT_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_REQUISITION_OUT_NAME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_ALTERNATIVE_SPLIT_RULE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_DEFAULT_WH_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_DEFAULT_WH_NAME, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.TIME_ZONE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_STIP_FIRST_RULE_CODE, EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_STIP_SECOND_RULE_CODE from EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE where 1=1 << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_EOGP_PM_CODE = :eocrEogpPmCode >> << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.EOCR_EOCP_PM_CODE = :eocrEocpPmCode >> << and EO_WAYBILL_CHILD_RULE.ORG_ID = :orgId>>
